function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Climate change triggering adverse environmental conditions that affect VBD incidence.","Impact":"Increased risk of vector-borne diseases (VBDs) due to changing environmental factors.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to counteract the adverse effects of climate change on environmental conditions.","Technologies":"Climate-resilient building designs, green infrastructure, sustainable urban planning.","People":"Population residing in areas susceptible to vector-borne diseases.","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, public health agencies, and environmental organizations."},{"Description":"Data paucity for actionable insights on the magnitude and complexity of malaria risk factors.","Impact":"Lack of effective strategies for managing and mitigating malaria risk factors.","Mitigation":"Invest in research for actionable insights, improve data collection and analysis methods.","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning, remote sensing, GIS mapping.","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists, data scientists, and policy makers.","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, and international organizations."},{"Description":"Population growth and urbanization contributing to the risk of malaria transmission in the global south.","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria transmission due to rapid population growth and urbanization.","Mitigation":"Implement sustainable urban planning, improve sewage and waste management, and enhance public health infrastructure in growing urban areas.","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, IoT sensors for environmental monitoring, GIS for urban planning.","People":"Urban residents, public health officials, urban planners.","Owner":"Local governments, urban development authorities, public health agencies."}]}
